description: This sets the type of queue to be used for prioritizing ops within each OSD.
Max random write IOPS capacity (at 4 KiB block size) to consider per OSD (for solid state media)
The maximum sequential bandwidth in bytes/second to consider for the OSD (for solid state media)
The number of worker threads spawned per OSD shard for a given OSD (for solid state media)
the number of shards allocated for a given OSD (for solid state media).
The default amount of memory BlueStore will use for its cache when backed by an SSD.
Automatically tune the space ratios assigned to various BlueStore caches while respecting minimum values.
The number of seconds to wait between rebalances when cache autotune is enabled.
When tcmalloc and cache autotuning is enabled, try to keep this many bytes mapped in memory.
Ratio of bluestore cache to devote to metadata
Ratio of bluestore cache to devote to key/value database (RocksDB)
The size of the socket buffer on the receiving end of a network connection. Disable by default.
Transport type used by Async Messenger. Can be async+posix, async+dpdk or async+rdma
How many work requestes for rdma send queue.
None
Max number of loop before we reset threadpool’s handle
OSD 操作优先级队列（Priority Queue, PQ）的最小消耗成本，影响 OSD 处理 I/O 操作时的任务调度策略
控制 OSD 代理任务（Agent Task）的延迟时间，即 OSD 在执行某些后台任务（如数据恢复、数据迁移、心跳检查）时的最小延迟时间
控制 OSD 代理任务（Agent Tasks）每次最多可以执行的操作数（operations），即 限制 OSD 处理后台任务（如数据恢复、数据迁移、心跳检测）的最大并发数量
Sets the number of replicas for objects in the pool.
The default number of placement groups for a pool.
Default PG autoscaling behavior for new pools
BlueFS instance of allocator is initialized with bluefs alloc size
Maximum number of placement groups to list.
The max omap size for a single request.
Interval in seconds between journal header updates (to help bound replay time)
